summary:
Wally Erc20 - Is an innovative meme/utility and will be the new form of payment on the eth network

 Wally 0% TAX - Wally is the first true DCT Decentralized community token built by the community. We don't rely on a developer to build for us, anybody can build on Wally. We are a zero tax token. We rely on people who want to see Wally successful. No more devs building projects and dumping tokens to enrich themselves. Wally is a movement that proves a community can have more power then one single developer because you are the Dev. You are Wally.

 Community token - Wally is the first true DCT decentrealized Community token built by the community and stands by the community.

 Owned by the community - Wally is the only project that has stood on a based community.

 Effective 0 tax - Wally is a 0 tax Community that runs with donation and doesnt have any hidden tax.

 Wally is your home - Wally is a 0 tax token that was built 0 tax and remains 0 tax , Wally is your Home join the family.

 Donate to wally - View Chart
